positive_examples: This is an example of cutting fluid.
The cutting fluid demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed cutting fluid in this context.
A typical case of cutting fluid would involve these features.
The concept of cutting fluid applies here.
A lubricant used in machining operations to cool and lubricate cutting tools and workpieces.
negative_examples: This is an example of grease, not cutting fluid.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Grease, or other types of Lubricant

definition: A liquid used to cool and lubricate during metal cutting and machining operations.
